name: Sam Mitchell
description: Sam Mitchell, originally from South Africa, spent over 10 years in the UK and now living in Sydney. She comes to the team with extensive writing and Social Media experience covering a wide variety of genres from book reviews, eBooks, Whitepapers, blogs, guides to news pieces...and so much more. Sam has been a Freelance Writer for over 15 years, having worked with many different clients, and entered the Crypto world in 2016. You can get in touch with Sam at www.stmwritingsolutions.com.
